text: @VOANews Coronavirus cannot stop anyone striving for our deserved freedom. Lawful for citizens to do shoppings and dine out during #MothersDay. Common for Hong Kong police to arrest any citizens/press it wants. That’s police’s disgusting love to us. Never forget #mothersday2020. https://t.co/dl5SVfZlM9

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
